1051140.name: AUSSIE BATTLER TANKS Demo
1051140.description:
AUSSIE BATTLER TANKS
ENGLISH SPEAKING ONLY.
8 WW2 TANKS, 2 TO 12 PLAYERS WITH HASSLE FREE MULTIPLAYER HOSTING ON CLOUD NETWORK , 3 GAME MODES TDM CTF CP AND 5 MAPS.
HIT POINTS DAMAGE SYSTEM WITH AP AND HE SHELLS, AND EACH TANK HAS ITS INDERVIUAL ADVANTAGES, LIKE DRIVE SPEED- TURRET TURN SPEED- RELOAD TIME- FIRE POWER- DAMAGE POINTS
FILE SIZE ON DISK AFTER INSTALL IS 5GB.
WINERS ARE GRINNERS COPY AND SHARE WITH FREINDS IF YOU ARE AUSTRALIAN RESIDENT.

READ ME INFO:
LOWEST PC SPECS - CPU = QUAD CORE 2.6 GHZ, RAM MEMORY = 6 GB,
LOWEST ONBOARD VIDEO ="NVIDIA GTX460" "intel(r) hd graphics 630", WITH AT LEAST 3GHZ QUADCORE CPU IF NO VIDEO CARD.
RECOMEND VIDEO CARDS "AMD ATI R9 370" "AMD ATI RX 570" OR "NVIDIA GTX 970" WITH 4GB MEM OR BETTER.

3 GAME MODES = TDM-TEAM DEATH MATCH, CTF-CAPTURE THE FLAG, CP-CONTROL POINTS DOMINATION.
5 WW2 MAPS.
8 WW2 TANKS.
2 TO 12 PLAYERS.

EASY PHOTON CLOUD PLAYER ROUND HOSTING WITH OPTIONS LIKE PASSWORD, FREINDS, PING LIMIT, QUICK MATCH, GAME MODES, PLAYERS LIMIT, MUCH MORE.

MENU = ESC.
PLAYER SCORE = TAB.

DRIVE MOVEMENT = ARROW KEYS.
TURRET MOVEMENT = MOUSE
ZOOM IN OUT = MOUSE WHEEL.
AIM = RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON.
SWAP SHELL TYPE ARMOUR PIERCE OR HIGH EXPLOSIVE = V
DRIVER CAMERA CHANGE = F
FIRE BUTTON = LEFT MOUSE
VOTE = F1 YES, F2 NO.
MESSAGE TEXT ENTER T FOR CHAT, Y FOR TEAM.
Mature Content Description
1051140.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
